title: Sweet and spicy ginger beer pulled pork
ingredients: ['2 sweet onions, peeled and quartered', '2 teaspoons coarse sea salt, or to taste', '1 1/2 teaspoons dark brown sugar, or more to taste', '1 1/2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '1 (2.7kg) pork shoulder', '375ml ginger beer']
